Uses of Class
png.PngChunk

  • Packages that use PngChunk 
    Package Description
    png
    Functionality for parsing and processing PNG image files is provided here.

    • Uses of PngChunk in png

      Subclasses of PngChunk in png 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  PngChunkITXT
      Extended to support an iTXt chunk in a PNG file, which stores international text data.
      class  PngChunkTEXT
      Represents a tEXt chunk in a PNG file, which stores original textual data.
      class  PngChunkTIME
      Encapsulates the tIME ancillary chunk, which records the last modification time of the image content (not the creation time).
      class  PngChunkTIME2
      Encapsulates the tIME ancillary chunk, which records the last modification time of the image content.
      class  PngChunkZTXT
      Extended to support a zTXt (compressed textual data) chunk in a PNG file.
      Fields in png with type parameters of type PngChunk 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.List<PngChunk> PngDirectory.chunks 
      private java.util.List<PngChunk> ChunkHandler.chunks 
      Methods in png that return PngChunk 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private PngChunk ChunkHandler.addChunk(ChunkType chunkType, long length, byte[] typeBytes, int crc32, byte[] data, long offsetStart)
      Adds a parsed chunk to the internal chunk collection.
      private PngChunk PngDirectory.findChunkByType(ChunkType type)
      Searches for the first PngChunk in the directory whose ChunkType matches the specified type.
      PngChunk PngDirectory.getFirstChunk(ChunkType chunk)
      Retrieves the first PngChunk in this directory whose ChunkType matches the specified chunk type.
      Methods in png that return types with arguments of type PngChunk 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<PngChunk>> ChunkHandler.getChunks()
      Retrieves a list of chunks that have been extracted.
      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<PngChunk>> ChunkHandler.getChunks(ChunkType.Category cat)
      Retrieves a list of specific chunks based on the specified category.
      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<PngChunk>> ChunkHandler.getChunks(ChunkType type)
      Retrieves a list of specific chunks based on the specified type, for example: tEXt, iTXt, or eXIf etc.
      java.util.Optional<PngChunk> ChunkHandler.getFirstChunk(ChunkType type)
      Retrieves the first occurrence of the chunk matching the specified type.
      java.util.Optional<PngChunk> ChunkHandler.getLastChunk(ChunkType type)
      Retrieves the last instance of the chunk matching the specified type.
      java.util.Iterator<PngChunk> PngDirectory.iterator()
      Returns an Iterator over the PngChunks in this directory.
      Methods in png with parameters of type PngChunk 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void PngDirectory.add(PngChunk chunk)
      Adds a single PngChunk to this directory.
      boolean PngDirectory.contains(PngChunk entry)
      Checks if a specific PngChunk is present in this directory.
      boolean PngDirectory.remove(PngChunk entry)
      Removes a PngChunk entry from this Directory.
      private static void PngDatePatcher.updateChunkCRC(ImageRandomAccessWriter writer, PngChunk chunk, byte[] updatedPayload)
      Updates the CRC checksum for a specific chunk to ensure the file remains valid after a surgical patch.
      Method parameters in png with type arguments of type PngChunk 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int PngDirectory.addChunkList(java.util.List<PngChunk> chunkList)
      Adds all PngChunk objects from the specified list to this directory.
